snippet.title: 20XX 0.84b 3 minute gameplay feel video
snippet.description:
Footage made for our IMB submission for PAX East 2016. This footage is intended only to show how 20XX's basic gameplay works -- progressing through levels, collecting powerups, battling bosses.

The video contains the first level and a half of a run, and is not indicative of the game's difficulty. (It's harder than this.)

20XX's co-op currently supports up to 2 players, either on the same machine or online via Steam.

20XX also has seeded Daily Challenges, so you can see how you stack up against your friends!

It's available on Steam Early Access now -- entering Beta on September 15, 2015! 

http://store.steampowered.com/app/322110

Thanks for watching!
